queries.query_string: SELECT id, name, quantity, price FROM crm.tbl_product WHERE quantity < {INT} ORDER BY quantity ASC FETCH FIRST {INT} ROWS ONLY;

queries.query_string: UPDATE crm.tbl_product SET quantity = quantity + 1 WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM (SELECT id FROM crm.tbl_product ORDER BY RAND() FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY) AS r);
